data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Amethi an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Amethi a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 150 believers in the county of Amethi the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 13,285 who are far from you in Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kalwar Jaiswal people. Make the Kalwar Jaiswal people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Amethi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, convict the 150 believers in Amethi to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

location.name: Amethi
location.people_groups_list: Kumhar (Hindu traditions), Kol, Kumhar Bardiha, Rajput Baghel (Hindu traditions), Teli Sribastab
